long_description: The Skhoop Original skirt is a versatile, insulated overskirt for cold and windy days. Great for walking, waiting for the bus or watching the hockey game in the bleachers. Skhoop Original skirt is made from lightweight polyester with 80 grams of slim, synthetic insulation for no-fuss wear and care. Open-ended zip on the right side makes it easy to take on and off; zip on the left side extends to the hip. Rear elastic in the waistband provides a good fit. 2 zippered front hand pockets.
short_description: The Skhoop Original skirt is a versatile, insulated overskirt for cold and windy days. Great for walking, waiting for the bus or watching the hockey game in the bleachers.
